external_games.name: Train Simulator: Colton & Northern Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Colton & Northern Route Add-On
summary: Richard Garber of All Aboard has raised the bar once again with his second excellent and immersive American route for Train Simulator. This time set against the back drop of two completely disconnected towns coming together over the formation of a railroad to extract newly discovered raw materials from the area.
